Mau Tanam Modal di RI, Investor Asing Juga Pakai Jasa Detektif Swasta
03 Nov 2019, 07:43 by Danang Sugianto


Foto: Edy Wahyono

Jakarta - Percaya atau tidak, profesi detektif swasta memang benar ada dalam kehidupan nyata. Mereka menawarkan jasanya untuk berbagai macam misi, seperti menyelidiki pasangan selingkuh, pegawai yang korupsi, penyembunyian aset, hingga memata-matai rekanan bisnis.Biasanya mereka yang menjalani profesi ini bergerak secara diam-diam. Mereka menyembunyikan identitas asli dirinya.Seperti, salah satu narasumber detikcom yang mau ditulis namanya sebagai Black Widow. Dia adalah seorang penyedia jasa intelijen khusus untuk investor asing."Kalau dibilang detektif di pikiran saya seperti Sherlock Holmes. Saya hanya seperti bisnis intelijen," tuturnya.Wanita yang ingin identitasnya dirahasiakan ini memang hanya menawarkan jasa pencarian informasi. Jasanya digunakan kebanyakan oleh konsultan maupun perusahaan asing yang ingin berinvestasi di Indonesia.Ternyata perusahaan-perusahaan asing itu jauh lebih mementingkan informasi tentang calon rekannya di Indonesia maupun pejabat-pejabat terkait yang berhubungan dengan investasinya di Indonesia, ketimbang regulasi perizinan."Misalnya ada calon investor asing mau menanam modal di sini, mereka ingin tahu. Misalnya pemerintah lelang proyek tol, atau pabrik pupuk, ada kasus korupsi yang melibatkan rekanya. Nah mereka ini kan nggak punya akses khusus untuk dapat informasi. Sementara yang ada di media kan hanya di permukaan, mereka ingin tahu di balik cerita itu ada siapa," tuturnya.Kebanyakan dari kliennya meminta untuk mengumpulkan informasi sedetail mungkin tentang perusahaan rekanannya. Mulai dari rekam jejak perusahaan hingga informasi direksinya, apakah pernah tersandung kasus, siapa orang di belakangnya. Bahkan informasi pribadi, seperti apakah direksi perusahaannya punya perilaku menyimpang seperti pedofil. (das/toy)

Want to Invest in RI, Foreign Investors Also Use Private Detective Services
03 Nov 2019, 07:43 by Danang Sugianto


Photo: Edy Wahyono

Jakarta - Believe it or not, the private detective profession really does exist in real life. They offer their services for various missions, such as investigating cheating spouses, corrupt employees, hiding assets, to spying on business partners. Usually those who undergo this profession move quietly. They hide their real identity. Like, one of the sources who want to be written detikcom name as Black Widow. He is a provider of intelligence services specifically for foreign investors. "If you say detective in my mind like Sherlock Holmes. I just like the business of intelligence," he said. Women who want their identity to be kept secret indeed only offer information retrieval services. His services are used mostly by consultants and foreign companies who want to invest in Indonesia. It turns out that foreign companies are far more concerned with information about prospective colleagues in Indonesia and related officials relating to investment in Indonesia, rather than licensing regulations. "For example there are prospective investors foreigners want to invest here, they want to know, for example the government auctioning toll road projects, or fertilizer factories, there are corruption cases involving their partners. Now they don't have special access to information, while the media is only on the surface, they want to know who is behind the story, "he said. Most of his clients asked to gather as much detailed information as possible about their partner companies. Starting from the company's track record to the information of its directors, has there been a case, who is behind it. Even personal information, such as whether the directors of his company have deviant behavior such as pedophiles. (das / toy)
